# Alert Rubric

An alert is acceptable only if:
- It indicates user-impact (or imminent user-impact)
- It has a clear owner
- It has a runbook
- It is not noisy (rate limited / deduped)
- It is testable (can be triggered in staging)

## Alert record (template)
- Name:
- Severity:
- Condition:
- Why it matters:
- Runbook link:
- Owner:
